items.text: slower one, on the body, defended towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, no run

items.preText: My bad. It was not 2012 but 2014. England v India, third Test in Southampton when Giles and Dravid were on our ball-by-ball commentary
items.text: fuller on middle and leg, flicked towards square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: slower in the air, bowled on middle and leg, going with the arm as Chase misses the flick
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: with so many overs left, why would you play such a shot? down the track, was tossed up outside off, Chase looks to clear the long-off, not exactly to the pitch of the ball and as a result, doesn't middle it, Soumya takes a good overhead catch near the boundary
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, OUT

dismissal.text: RL Chase c Soumya Sarkar b Shakib Al Hasan 8 (20b 0x4 0x6) SR: 40.00

items.text: length around off, comes forward and blocks
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: length around off, almost chipping it to extra cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: back of length outside off, punched back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: length outside off, stays beside and steers it towards point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Allen, no run

items.text: length, angling across the batsman who was looking to run it down, misses
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Allen, no run

items.text: length again, just outside off and beating the inside edge this time, Allen has no idea what Mustafizur is bowling
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Allen, no run

items.text: cutter this time, comes forward and pushes it towards cover-point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Allen, no run

items.preText: Ovy: "I am remembering last some cricketing years of Brian Lara! He had done the same things what Hope is doing, fighting without any support."
items.text: back of length on middle and leg, defended towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Allen, no run

items.text: fuller, wide outside off, looks to drive it on the up, gets beaten
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Allen, no run

items.preText: Sajib: "If any part of bowlers foot is behind the line, regardless of on the ground or over, it's not a no ball. Why should a batsman must ground his foot/bat then? Where is the consistency when it comes to be 'behind the line'? "
items.text: flighted outside off, comes forward and pushes it back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller, just outside off, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: on middle and leg, swept this time but straight to short fine leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: length outside off, some extra bounce, Hope was on the front foot, low, looking to defend, takes off the bottom hand in the end
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: pitched up and driven towards long-off for a single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Allen, no run

items.preText: SunnyK: "I was so.. so.. dismayed by Chase's bad stoke.. I wished it should just cross the boundary or not a fielder. "
items.text: short of length but down the leg side and called a wide
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 wide

items.text: length outside off, Hope goes back, on his toes, punches it towards deep extra cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length, angling across the right-hander, beats the bat as he pushes at it
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Allen, no run

items.text: length again, in the line of the stumps, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Allen, no run

items.text: cutter, wide outside off, steered but straight to backward point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Allen, no run

items.text: length, angled across once more, another play and a miss
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Allen, no run
